name: Multi Translator
contributors: awamper: Original author of the gnome-shell extension called [Text Translator](https://github.com/awamper/text-translator).,gufoe: Author of the newer version of [Text Translator](https://github.com/gufoe/text-translator) gnome-shell extension.,soimort: Author of the translate-shell script (https://github.com/soimort/translate-shell).
comments: Bug reports, feature requests and contributions should be done on this xlet's repository linked below.
description: Translation of text by different translation providers (currently Google, Yandex, Bing and Apertium).
